hero.core_tension: Operators must choose a short, concentrated event window that trades steady daily traffic for intense, shareable attention. The mechanism is simple. This concentrated window creates content that converts beyond the hour.
hero.setting: Urban storefront interior. Three-quarter angle. Warm wood podiums and matte concrete floor. Clean negative space for hero subjects.
hero.persona: Brand retail lead and creator collaborating. Mid-30s operator, focused, directing light and placement.
hero.action: Arranging a merch hero group while a creator shoots short-form clips. Operator nods, signaling go. Momentum locks.
hero.urgency_symbol: A half-drawn curtain and a rising aperture of light that narrows the frame to imply a limited window.
hero.lighting: Polished editorial with confident highlights and clean negative space. Soft fill on faces, punch on key products.
hero.alt: Operator and creator arranging merch under studio light, curtain half-drawn to signal a limited weekend window

signal_map.structure: Concentric geometry: center event node, inner ring audience paths, outer ring distribution channels. The signal underneath is pulsed attention moving outward.
signal_map.motion: Discrete outward pulses from center on weekend nodes. Arcs that fan content into online channels and back into storefront loops.
signal_map.palette: Matte black base, warm amber highlights, paper white nodes, brushed steel accents for connectors
signal_map.alt: Concentric event-to-distribution map showing pulsed attention flowing from store event to online channels

case_studies.scene: Streetwear shop converted into a creator studio. Eye-level composition. Raw concrete floor, warm wood fixtures.
case_studies.moment: A creator records a series of short clips while the owner stages merch and checks sound. The mechanism is simple. Content extends the visit.
case_studies.persona: Independent brand owner (Stockboy) directing a creator-led studio day.
case_studies.lighting: Polished editorial highlights on product, soft ambient fill for the owner and creator.
case_studies.alt: Brand owner and creator capturing short-form content in a streetwear studio day

case_studies.scene: Vacant mall bay activated for an artist pop-up. Overhead three-quarter angle. Industrial materials, temporary risers.
case_studies.moment: An artist paints a wall while passersby pause and photograph. The signal underneath is earned attention that lifts adjacent visits.
case_studies.persona: Landlord activating an underperforming bay with a short-term artist installation.
case_studies.lighting: High-contrast editorial highlights to emphasize texture and spectators.
case_studies.alt: Landlord and artist staging a pop-up in a vacant retail bay to attract adjacent visitors

case_studies.scene: Ticketed micro-event in a compact retail footprint. Low-angle close three-quarter. Warm wood stage, brushed steel accents.
case_studies.moment: An instructor leads a small class while a camera captures sequences for post-event drops. This changes discounting math. Attention replaces blanket markdowns.
case_studies.persona: Brand retail lead (Splits59) running micro-events to produce content and drive direct orders.
case_studies.lighting: Polished editorial with focused spot on instructor and soft rim on audience.
case_studies.alt: Brand retail lead running a ticketed micro-event producing video assets and direct orders
